content: विसर्गः {@--1@} Sending forth, emission. {@--2@} Shedding, pouring down, dropping; <ls>R. 16. 38.</ls> {@--3@} Casting, discharge. {@--4@} Giving away, a gift, donation; आदानं हि विसर्गाय सतां वारिमुचामिव <ls>R. 4. 86</ls> (where the word means ‘pouring down’ also). {@--5@} Sending away, dismissal. {@--6@} Creation, creating. {@--7@} Ahandonment, relinquishment. {@--8@} Voiding, evacuation; as in पुरीषविसग {@--9@} Departure, separation. {@--10@} Final beatitude. {@--11@} Light, splendour. {@--12@} A symbol in writing, representing a distinct hard aspiration and marked by two perpendicular dots (H). {@--13@} The southern course of the sun. {@--14@} The penis.
